title: New: SBTRKT – Gamelena
body:
So I guess **SBTRKT** have pretty much gone mainstream now, still, this new track, described by **Aaron Jerome** himself as ‘_something new – no plan for it – just thought id share_‘ is a much welcome progression.

From the sound of this demo it appears that he may be heading in a more house orientated direction, with _Gamelena_ bringing about comparisons to the likes of **Laurent Garnier** with it’s vivid, extremely danceable vibe. Check out _Gamelena_ below.
